mapper.select: select * from inst where outsrc_yn = 'N' order by inst_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inst(inst_no, inst_nm, outsrc_yn) VALUES (#{instNo}, #{instNm}, #{outsrcYn})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT usr.inst_no FROM sr_rqst JOIN usr ON sr_rqst.sr_reqstr_no = usr.usr_no WHERE usr.inst_no = #{instNo} AND sr_rqst.sr_rqst_stts_no != 'DEP_CMPTN' UNION SELECT pic.inst_no FROM sr JOIN sr_rqst ON sr.sr_rqst_no = sr_rqst.sr_rqst_no JOIN usr pic ON sr.pic_usr_no = pic.usr_no WHERE pic.inst_no = #{instNo} AND sr_rqst.sr_rqst_stts_no != 'DEP_CMPTN' UNION SELECT sr_trnsf_inst_no FROM sr JOIN sr_rqst ON sr.sr_rqst_no = sr_rqst.sr_rqst_no WHERE sr_trnsf_inst_no = #{instNo} AND sr_rqst.sr_rqst_stts_no != 'DEP_CMPTN' )
